title: Prediction Set
description: A file set of computational predictions. Prediction sets contain results of analyses to predict functions or traits of genomic features.

scope.comment: If scope is genes then small_scale_gene_list or large_scale_gene_list is required, if scope is loci then small_scale_loci_list or large_scale_loci_list are required, if scope is genome-wide then small_scale_gene_list, large_scale_gene_list, small_scale_loci_list, and large_scale_loci_list shouldn't be specified.

small_scale_gene_list.comment: Specification of small_scale_gene_list requires that scope is genes and is mutually exclusive with specification of large_scale_gene_list.

large_scale_gene_list.comment: Specification of large_scale_gene_list requires that scope is genes and is mutually exclusive with specification of small_scale_gene_list.

small_scale_loci_list.comment: Specification of small_scale_loci_list requires that scope is loci and is mutually exclusive with specification of large_scale_loci_list.

large_scale_loci_list.comment: Specification of large_scale_loci_list requires that scope is loci and is mutually exclusive with specification of small_scale_loci_list.

file_set_type.description: The category that best describes this prediction set.
file_set_type.comment: File set type describes the feature being predicted by the results in the prediction set.

enum_descriptions.activity level: Predictive modeling of an input variable on activiy level.
enum_descriptions.binding effect: Predictive modeling of an input variable on TF binding effect.
enum_descriptions.functional effect: Predictive modeling of an input variable on functional effect.
enum_descriptions.pathogenicity: Predictive modeling of an input variable on pathogenicity.
enum_descriptions.protein stability: Predictive modeling of an input variable on protein stability.

scope.title: Prediction Scope
scope.description: The scope or scale that this prediction set is designed to target.

enum_descriptions.genes: The prediction set is predicting upon specific genes.
enum_descriptions.loci: The prediction set is predicting upon specific loci.
enum_descriptions.genome-wide: The prediction set is predicting upon the whole genome.

small_scale_gene_list.description: The specific, small scale list of (<=100) gene(s) whose functionality is investigated in this prediction set. This property describes the input variables of the prediction set. For example, this list consists of the genes whose expression level is predicted in this prediction set. It differs from assessed_genes (see more information under assessed_genes).
small_scale_gene_list.comment: If more than 100 genes were predicted, submit large_scale_gene_list instead.

large_scale_gene_list.description: The large scale list of (>100 genes) whose functionality is investigated in this prediction set. This property describes the input variables of the prediction set. For example, this list consists of the genes whose expression level is predicted in this prediction set. It differs from assessed_genes (see more information under assessed_genes).
large_scale_gene_list.comment: If 100 or fewer genes were predicted, submit small_scale_gene_list instead.

small_scale_loci_list.description: A small scale (<=100) list of specific chromosomal region(s) whose functionality is investigated in this prediction set. This property describes the input variables of the prediction set. For example, this list consists of the genetic variants whose functionality is predicted in this prediction set.
small_scale_loci_list.comment: If more than 100 chromosomal regions were predicted, submit large_scale_loci_list instead.

large_scale_loci_list.description: A large scale list (>100) of specific chromosomal regions whose functionality is investigated in this prediction set. This property describes the input variables of the prediction set. For example, this list consists of the genetic variants whose functionality is predicted in this prediction set.
large_scale_loci_list.comment: If 100 or fewer chromosomal regions were predicted, submit small_scale_loci_list instead.

input_file_sets.description: The file set(s) required for this prediction set.

assessed_genes.title: Assessed Genes
assessed_genes.description: A list of gene(s) assessed in this prediction set. This property is used to describe the gene(s) being investigated, especially how the input variables in the prediction set affect some critical functionality of the gene(s). For example, the effect could be predicted from genetic variants on the binding affinity of a transcription factor encoded by a gene (assessed_genes). It differs from small_scale_gene_list and large_scale_gene_list, as these are used when the input variables of the prediction set are genes.

items.title: Gene
items.comment: See gene.json for a list of available identifiers.
